Author: weidex
Title: weiDex - decentralized exchange for the people
Body: WeiDex is a new innovative decentralized exchange. We have plenty of advantages over the existing solutions. Here we will list a few of them:  -All assets and trading logic are stored on the blockchain. No one can manipulate the trading and your accounts. -You get referral bonus equal to 20% from the exchange trading fee. All of your referrals are stored on the blockchain, so they are immutable. -We will have really low trading fee - between 0.1% - 0.2%. We will provide cheap listing fee also (for new ERC20 tokens). -We have cloud and blockchain based systems. Our product will be up and running 24/7, 365 days in the year. It will be no down times or system maintenance time. -For us the most important is our customers satisfaction. Therefore we will give 24 hours support and we will fix any existing problems. -We want to give you the best and the most friendly way to trade. We brought to live the Multiple Order Fulfillment! This means that you can set an order and it will take as much transactions as needed to fulfill and you will pay for only one transaction. This have never been done on any other decentralized exchange. It will save for the users time and fees. -We are open for blockchain tokens and coins... We have a great technical team, so we can list new coins in 24 hours after the request, for really cheap price. If you have new token do not hesitate to contact our team! -When we list a new tokens, we will require a fee from token creators. With this token fee, we will provide airdop of fresh new tokens for our loyal customers.[/li]  If you are interested, come and visit our website: https://www.weidex.market

Body: REAd your bounty thread which lead me here. Looks very attractive already. Your team however aren't familiar about the creation of ANN thread here. You should have subscribe as a copper member so you can post a better thread with visual presentation like the graphics to compare your exchange to the existing and provide the advantages of using your weiDEX. Also you can post the team members profile here so people will know them.

Author: Kallisteiros
Title: weiDex - decentralized exchange for the people
Body: Respectfully, the headline "turn your wei into ethers" makes no sense in the context of currency exchange, since wei is ether, same currency, different denomination. It's like saying "exchange your cents for dollars". Probably need to come up with something better.  Sounds great on paper, let us know when any code is ready.
